name: Jumping Kills You
description:
Jumping Kills You is a prototype game created for the Metroidvania Month 14 game jam. As the title suggests the concept of the game is that jumping decreases your health. The goal of the game is to navigate through sections of platforms that increase or decrease your health and to obtain new abilities that help you reach the end. The controls can be found in game or here:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump/Dash

Shift - View Map

Ctrl - Create Temporary Save Point
